descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]This mod adds a female follower. This is standalone.[/size]



[b][size=5][Follower detail][/size][/b]

[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65761-1-1431306764.jpg[/img]
[size=3]Name: Elina
Race: Nord
Level: 5 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager
Weight: 50
Location: Dragonsreach, Whiterun
Combat Style: One-handed warrior
Perks:
Light Foot, Armsman, Savage Strike, Shield Wall
Block Runner, Power Bash, Disarming Bash, Shield Charge
etc: Protected and marriable[/size]



[b][size=5][Recommended Mods][/size][/b]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url][/size]



[b][size=5][Credits][/size][/b]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhance Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal by hellosanta[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave
[/url][/size]
